mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (CARTNO, CARTUSERID, PNO, AMOUNT, PNAME, PPRICE, ORDERPRICE) VALUES (SEQ_CARTNO.NEXTVAL, #{ cartuserid }, #{ pno }, #{ amount }, #{ pname }, #{ pprice }, #{ orderprice })
mapper.select: SELECT C.*, (PPRICE * AMOUNT) ORDERPRICE, PA.CHANGENAME, PA.PNO AS ATTACHMENTPNO FROM CART C, PATTACHMENT PA WHERE C.PNO = PA.PNO AND C.CARTUSERID = #{ cartuserid } ORDER BY C.CARTNO DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CART WHERE CARTNO = #{ cartno }
